00114 
00115 inline QMCrgUnit *QMTopology::getCrgUnit(int id)
00116 {
00117     map<int, QMCrgUnit*>::iterator iter;
00118     iter = _crgunits_by_id.find(id);
00119     if(iter == _crgunits_by_id.end())
00120         throw std::runtime_error("did not find crgunit with id " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(id));
00121     return iter->second;
00122 }
00123 
00124 
00125 inline QMCrgUnit *QMTopology::GetCrgUnitByName(const string &name)
00126 {
00127     map<string, QMCrgUnit *>::iterator iter;
00128     iter = _mcharges.find(name);
00129     if(iter!=_mcharges.end())
00130         return iter->second;
00131     return NULL;
00132 }
00133 
00134 inline CrgUnitType *QMTopology::GetCrgUnitTypeByName(const string &type_name)
00135 {
00136     return _jcalc.GetCrgUnitTypeByName(type_name);
00137 }

00139 }}
